  Learning new things daily

Please Touch Me

I am still working through some more ideas for my simple new blog theme (more on the theme soon).

One thing I wanted to add to it now that most things have been removed are the “social sites” I currently participate in or would like to participate more in. With the Web 2.0 explosion, there are 1000’s of these sites, but so far there are only three that I use with any regularity.

  1. LinkedIn (my profile)
  2. Twitter (my tweets)
  3. Del.ico.us (my links)

—Feel free to connect, friend, or network with me if you enjoy any of the above.

Speaking of which, any site you think I am missing out on? I am thinking it would be a pretty cool mashup to mix the three above with a blog.

You could answer some really interesting questions:

  1. Who do you know and what have you done?
  2. What’s on your mind?
  3. What are you reading?
  4. What are writing/passionate about?

Posted on May 19, 2007 and tagged as delicious, twitter, social-networking, linkedin
